title: Crew Member
desc: Position Description What I Do • Deliver hot fresh food, in a clean and friendly restaurant, giving customers a great experience each visit, every time • Consistently deliver the highest standards of quality, service and cleanliness in the restaurant • Provide friendly, fast and accurate service Position Requirements Deliver A Great Customer Experience • Prepare the customer’s meal with care and respect – give your customers gold standard food and drink every time • Make it special – be welcoming, personalise your comments and connect with your customers • Make it genuine – give the customer your full attention, smile, use eye contact and body language that is enthusiastic and energetic • Adapt to each customer’s needs – give them an individual experience that exceeds their expectations, e. g.: o Be patient with customers who need help, offer to explain the menu o Get to know regular customers and treat them individually o Use positive gestures, e. g. offer to clear trays, help parents with pushchairs or make a child’s visit special • Use initiative and confidence when interacting with customers • Answer customer queries confidently and professionally – keep up-to-date with knowledge on our food and promotions • Treat all customers and colleagues with courtesy and respect • Work as a supportive team member McDonald's is an equal opportunities employer. Position Attributes Quality, Service & Cleanliness • Complete tasks and activities in line with training, company guidelines and management direction • Adhere to McDonald’s standards of quality, service and cleanliness • Follow all workplace safety, security and food hygiene procedures • Follow our guidelines and take pride in your personal appearance • Take responsibility for your training in all areas; look for opportunities to improve and develop Additional Information N/A Back to top no -- Principals only. Recruiters, please don’t contact this job advertiser. no -- Please, no phone calls about this job! no -- Reposting this message elsewhere is NOT OK.

desc: Position Description What I Do • Deliver hot fresh food, in a clean and friendly restaurant, giving customers a great experience each visit, every time • Consistently deliver the highest standards of quality, service and cleanliness in the restaurant • Provide friendly, fast and accurate service Position Requirements Deliver A Great Customer Experience • Prepare the customer’s meal with care and respect – give your customers gold standard food and drink every time • Make it special – be welcoming, personalise your comments and connect with your customers • Make it genuine – give the customer your full attention, smile, use eye contact and body language that is enthusiastic and energetic • Adapt to each customer’s needs – give them an individual experience that exceeds their expectations, e. g.: o Be patient with customers who need help, offer to explain the menu o Get to know regular customers and treat them individually o Use positive gestures, e. g. offer to clear trays, help parents with pushchairs or make a child’s visit special • Use initiative and confidence when interacting with customers • Answer customer queries confidently and professionally – keep up-to-date with knowledge on our food and promotions • Treat all customers and colleagues with courtesy and respect • Work as a supportive team member McDonald's is an equal opportunities employer. Position Attributes Quality, Service & Cleanliness • Complete tasks and activities in line with training, company guidelines and management direction • Adhere to McDonald’s standards of quality, service and cleanliness • Follow all workplace safety, security and food hygiene procedures • Follow our guidelines and take pride in your personal appearance • Take responsibility for your training in all areas; look for opportunities to improve and develop Additional Information N/A Additional Information All applicants must be 18+ years old. DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR FULL TIME FULLY FLEX HOURS. No set days or shifts available, you will be scheduled 5 days out of the 7 across the week and these will vary in start times. title: Housekeeping Supervisor
desc: Housekeeping Supervisor The Killarney Plaza Hotel is searching for a passionate, standard driven supervisor to help run the accommodation department in one of Killarney’s most vibrant properties. Previous experience is essential for this role; we are looking for a team player who has an extreme eye for detail. The main purpose of the Housekeeping Supervisor is to oversee the supervision of housekeeping staff and to ensure the delivery of high standards of cleanliness and service throughout the property. This includes the following: You will be required to maintain our high standards of cleanliness and hygiene in our bedrooms, bathrooms and public areas. To understand all standards of performance and delivery within the accommodation department. Oversee staff on a daily basis. Check rooms and common areas, including stairways and lounge areas, for cleanliness. Schedule shifts and arrange for replacements in cases of absence. Establish and educate staff on cleanliness, tidiness and hygiene standards. Motivate team members and resolve any issues that occur on the job. Respond to customer complaints and special requests. Coordinates work activities among departments. Inventories stock to ensure adequate supplies. Evaluates records to forecast department personnel requirements. Examines building to determine need for repairs or replacement of furniture or equipment, and makes recommendations to management. Attends staff meetings to discuss company policies and complaints. Attend and conduct briefings for team members. Manage and record lost property in accordance with standards and procedures. Requirements Work experience as a Housekeeping Supervisor or similar role. Hands-on experience with cleaning and maintenance tasks for large organizations. Excellent organizational and team management skills. Flexibility to work various shifts, including evenings and weekends. If you think you would be the candidate suitable for this role please email our human resources department at hr@odrhotels. com and careers@odrhotels. com. We look forward to hearing from you. no -- Principals only. title: Housekeeping Assistant
desc: About the Job:We have a position for a housekeeping assistant available immediately. Responsibilities will include:Servicing of rooms. Maintaining high levels of cleanliness. Assisting in the management of the housekeeping department. Maximise customer satisfaction by cleaning guests bedrooms in accordance with our standards. Be responsible for cleaning the corridor that you work on. Work in the public areas of the hotel, cleaning all areas to a high standard. Work in the in-house laundry when necessary. Qualifications:Attention to detail. Must be able to work at least 5 days per week. Experience in a similar hotel essential. Must have authorization to work in Ireland . About The Moorings:Family run since 1958, Patricia and Gerard Kennedy took over The Bridge Bar in 1988, adding The Moorings Restaurant in 1994 with six rooms above. The Moorings Restaurant quickly obtained a reputation for fine dining specializing in fresh seafood landed at the local pier. In 1998 the Bridge Bar underwent a complete transformation to become the very special place we know today – offering a warm and comfortable dining experience by the large open fire and a place to have a relaxing pint by the bar, along with a dance floor to accommodate the more active! The following year, eight new rooms were added to the Moorings Guesthouse with the emphasis on space, style and comfort.2006 saw the refurbishment of the original accommodation area and the addition of a further 5 rooms above the new Gift Shop, ‘Cois Cuain’. The Moorings Guesthouse “Best described as a restaurant with rooms, perhaps even a boutique hotel” now offers 4 stylish seaview mini suites complete with jacuzzi baths and 12 spacious rooms to accommodate our valued guests whether they be singles, couples or families. Everyone can be assured of a warm welcome and the highest standards of efficiency and attention to detail. In 2015 & 2017, Star Wars, The Force Awakens & The Last Jedi, were filmed on Skellig Michael in Portmagee. The Moorings was host to the pre production team of the movie. During the time of filming, the village was alive with media, journalists and Star Wars fans. Portmagee has since become a tourist hot spot for tourists and fans to visit the once “sleepy town of Portmagee” to listen to the stories from the locals and visit the Island where the magic took place. no -- Principals only.
